{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SFR |model=Neufbox 6 |revision= |est_release_date=11/16/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |availability=now |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway, |fcc_id= |pwr_v= |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=DIN |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6361 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68B16CWPA-25H |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM6361 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=8-bit 25MHz Microcontroller;Silicon Labs;C8051T634;;1; ,,, Single-Chip ProSLIC (FXS);Silicon Labs;Si32175;;1; |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Box Evolution NB6 (Neufbox 6)}}
*[https://fr.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/La_box_de_SFR On the '''Wikipedia'''] (FR) *[http://neufbox6.blogspot.com/ On the '''Neufbox''' blog] *[https://www.neufbox4.org/wiki/index.php?title=Neufbox_6 On the '''Neufbox''' wiki]
Multiple PCBs versions from multiple manufacturers: *NB6-FXC-r0 ([[Foxconn]], F01L030) *NB6-SER-r0 ([[SerComm]], YSL00K-1.6) :The CPU on the SerComm board is part BCM6361VKFEBG
===Serial=== ====Pinout==== Per the ''Neufbox'' wiki, the serial header is J10 (appears to only be :on the Foxconn board, SerComm board appears to be J302). The pinout is (GND) (TxD) (RxD) (VCC).
====CFE log==== is available on the [http://www.neufbox4.org/wiki/index.php?title=CFE#Affichage_CFE_sur_une_NB6-FXC-r0 ''Neufbox'' wiki]
==Images== ===Mirrored from the Neufbox wiki=== <gallery caption="Foxconn PCB"> File:Pcb NB6-FXC-r0 top.jpg|top File:Pcb NB6-FXC-r0 bottom.jpg|bottom </gallery> <gallery caption="SerComm PCB"> File:PCB-verso-NB6-SER-r0 top.jpg|top File:PCB-verso-NB6-SER-r0.jpg|bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
